name: Scarecrow (Farming + FPS Wave Survival)
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 41 game jam.

This game combines Farming aspects and FPS Wave Survival.

Grow Health and Ammo crops on the various plots (look for the square patches of dirt on the ground).

Buy the seeds, plant the crops, water the crops, harvest!

Find the water well to stock up your watering can.

The zombies get stronger and larger in numbers every round, and don’t forget to protect your crops because they will destroy them!

Aim for the head!
